seg.source: Treysa hat mit Vandalismus und Unrat zu kämpfen
seg.translation: Treysa has struggled against vandalism and garbage
Treysa marred by vandalism and trash
Treysa has to deal with vandalism and debris

seg.source: Der Einstieg in den 36 Kilometer langen Bahnradweg im Rotkäppchenland in Treysa präsentiert sich schwer auffindbar und vermüllt.
seg.translation: Accessing the 36-kilometer cycle track in Rotkäppchenland in Treysa is very difficult and heavily littered.
The start of the 36 kilometer-long track cycling path in the Red Riding Hood Forest in Treysa is difficult to find and littered.
The entrance to the 36-kilometre-long railway cycle path in Red Riding Hood Land in Treysa is difficult to find and littered.

seg.source: Rezepte gegen den grassierenden Vandalismus werden gesucht, aber Lösungen zeichnen sich kaum ab.
seg.translation: Attempts are made to remedy the rampant vandalism, but there are hardly any signs of solutions.
Solutions to the rampant vandalism are being sought, but nothing concrete stands out as of yet.
Recipes against rampant vandalism are sought, but solutions are few and far between.

seg.source: Scherben, Zigarettenkippen, Müll und Unrat, demolierte Mülleimer und mittlerweile demontierte Hinweisschilder - so präsentiert sich seit Längerem der Einstieg mit Sitzgruppe zum Radweg auf dem Haaße-Hügel in Treysa.
seg.translation: Shards, cigarette butts, garbage and rubbish, demolished rubbish bins and now dismantled signs - so for quite some time presents itself the entrance with seating area to the bike path on the Haaße-hill in Treysa.

Shards of glass, cigarette butts, litter and trash, broken bins and discarded notice signs - for a long time, this has been the scene at the starting point of the bike path and its seating area on the Haaße hill in Treysa.

Shards, cigarette butts, garbage and debris, demolished bins and meanwhile dismantled signs - this is how the entrance with seating group to the bike path on the Haaße hill in Treysa has been presented for a long time.

seg.source: Für das Vorzeigeobjekt Bahnradweg im Rotkäppchenland ein mehr als unrühmlicher Anblick.
seg.translation: The sight of the bicycle path, which is the flagship object in Rotkäpchenland, is more than inglorious.
For the showpiece bike path in Red Riding Hood Land - it is more than an inglorious sight.
For the showpiece railway cycle path in the Red Riding Hood country a more than inglorious sight.

seg.source: Das Thema beschäftigt Mitglieder der ADFC-Ortsgruppe Schwalmstadt aber auch andere schon länger, so der Radverkehrsbeauftragte der Stadt Ulrich Wüstenhagen.
seg.translation: The matter is of concern to the ADFC (German Cyclists Association) chapter Schwalmstadt, but others have also taken interest for some time, according to the city's cycling commissioner Ulrich Wüstenhagen.
The local section of the German Bicycle Club (ADFC) in Schwalmstadt has been dealing with the issue for much longer, according to the city's cycling officer, Ulrich Wüstenhagen.
The topic has been occupying members of the ADFC local group Schwalmstadt but also others for some time, according to Ulrich Wüstenhagen, the city's cycling commissioner.

seg.source: Das Problem sei bereits im Radverkehrsbeirat angesprochen worden.
seg.translation: The problem has already been addressed by the bicycle traffic advisory body.
The issue has already been discussed in the cycling advisory board.
The issue had already been raised in the Cycling Advisory Board.

seg.source: Eine Lösung gebe es bisher nicht.
seg.translation: There is no solution so far.
No solution has yet been found.
So far, there is no solution.

seg.source: Die Vorschläge reichten von der Verlegung der Sitzgruppe bis hin zu regelmäßiger Entleerung der Abfallbehälter und Reinigung der Flächen an der Einstiegsstelle.
seg.translation: Suggestions ranged from transferring the seating area to the regular emptying of garbage cans, and cleaning the point of entry areas.
Suggestions ranged from the removal of the seating area to the regular emptying of waste bins and the cleaning of the area at the start of the ascent.
The proposals ranged from the relocation of the seating group to the regular emptying of the waste bins and cleaning of the areas at the entry point.

seg.source: "Ich denke, Letzteres wäre das Gebot der Stunde - unabhängig von möglichen weiteren Aktivitäten", sagt Wüstenhagen.
seg.translation: I think, the latter would be the order of the day, irrespective of any further activities, says Wüstenhagen.
"I think that the time has come for the latter - regardless of any further action that may be taken", said Wüstenhagen.
"I think the latter would be the order of the day - regardless of possible further activities," Wüstenhagen says.

seg.source: Guido Hahn (ADFC) berichtet, das Thema ebenfalls in den Ortsbeirat eingebracht zu haben.
seg.translation: Guido Hahn (ADFC) says he also brought the issue up with the local advisory council.
Guido Hahn (ADFC) states that he has also raised the issue in the local advisory board.
Guido Hahn (ADFC) reports that he has also brought the topic to the local advisory board.

seg.source: Nicht nur der Müll treibt Radfahrer und Anwohner um - die Sitzgruppe ist an Wochenenden regelmäßiger Treffpunkt zum Feiern.
seg.translation: Not only the rubbish is a nuisance for cyclists and residents - on weekends the seating group is a regular meeting place for partying.
It is not just rubbish which is a concern for cyclists and residents - the seating area is a regular meeting spot for youths at the weekend.
It's not just the rubbish that drives cyclists and residents around - the seating area is a regular meeting place for partying at weekends.

seg.source: Dabei geht es nicht nur häufig laut zu, bei den Gelagen wird auch zerstört: Pfosten aus der Erde gerissen, Mülleimer demoliert, Schilder umgeknickt, Sitzmöbel beschmiert.
seg.translation: It is not just about the noise, there are also disturbances due to parties: Posts pulled out of the ground, garbage cans wrecked, signs snapped and seating daubed.
These youths are not only loud, they also cause damage: posts are ripped out of the ground, rubbish bins are broken, signs are bent and seats are daubed with dirt.
Not only is it often loud, the banquets also destroy: posts are torn out of the ground, rubbish bins are demolished, signs are bent over, seating furniture is smeared.

seg.source: Freiwillige hätten bereits häufiger aufgeräumt, erzählt ADFC-Mitglied Susanne Klippert.
seg.translation: Frequently volunteers have already cleaned up, explains the ADFC member Susanne Klippert.
ADFC member Susanne Klippert claims that volunteers have frequently cleaned up.
Volunteers have already cleaned up more often, says ADFC member Susanne Klippert.

seg.source: Die Aktionen seien aber nur der sprichwörtliche Tropfen auf den heißen Stein.
seg.translation: Actions are only proverbial drops in the ocean.
These actions, however, are just the proverbial drop in the ocean.
But the actions are only the proverbial drop in the ocean.

seg.source: Sie ärgern sich, dass der Rastplatz am Radweg in Treysa Treffpunkt für Saufgelage ist.
seg.translation: They are annoyed that the rest area at the cycle track in Treysa is a meeting point for binge-drinking.
People are angry that the resting area of the Treysa bike path has become a meeting point for drunkards.
They are annoyed that the rest area on the bike path in Treysa is a meeting point for binge drinking.

seg.source: "Entlang des gesamten Radweges liegt hier am Haaße-Hügel eindeutig der Schwerpunkt", bestätigt der Radverkehrsbeauftragte, der sich nun auch um die neue Radstätte in Ziegenhain sorgt, die heute eröffnet wird.
seg.translation: Clearly the focus point along the entire bike path is here on the Haaße, confirms the cycling commissioner, who now is also responsible for the cycling site in Ziegenhain, which will be opened today.

"This point of the Haaße hill is the focal point of the entire bike path", confirms the cycling officer, who is currently occupied with the new water wheel in Ziegenhain which is being declared open today.

"Along the entire cycle path, the focus is clearly on the Haaße hill," confirms the cycling commissioner, who is now also concerned about the new cycling centre in Ziegenhain, which will be opened today.

seg.source: "Erleidet sie dasselbe Schicksal, wird es richtig teuer".
seg.translation: If it suffers the same fate, it will cost dearly.
"If the bike path suffers the same fate - the price will be high".
'If she suffers the same fate, it's going to be really expensive. '

seg.source: Eine weitere Idee sei eine Videoüberwachung am Hügel: "Möglicherweise setzt das die Schwelle deutlich höher, sich an Gemeingut zu vergreifen.
seg.translation: Another idea is placing video surveillance on the hill: "Possibly this raises the threshold to engage in damaging common property.
One other idea is the video surveillance of the hill: "Maybe this will raise the stakes of misbehavior on public property.
Another idea, he said, is video surveillance on the hill: "Maybe that sets the threshold much higher for seizing public property.

seg.source: Das würde allerdings voraussetzen, dass dann zeitnah eine Polizeistreife vorbeikommt.
seg.translation: However, this would require a police patrol to come out.
However, this would then need a police patrol to come promptly.
This would, however, require a police patrol to pass by in a timely manner.

seg.source: Grundsätzlich wünscht sich Wüstenhagen eine Entwicklung des Haaße-Hügels.
seg.translation: In principle, Wüstenhagen supports the development of the Haaße hill.
Wüstenhagen wants to develop the Haaße hill.
In principle, Wüstenhagen wishes to see the development of the Haaße Hill.

seg.source: Er müsse attraktiver gestaltet werden.
seg.translation: It needs to be made more attractive.
It has to be made more appealing.
It needs to be made more attractive.

seg.source: Mit der Frequentierung des Radweges bisher könne man nämlich sehr zufrieden sein.
seg.translation: So far one can be very satisfied with how well the bicycle path is frequented.
Up to now, the use of the bike path has been very pleasing.
One can be very satisfied with the frequency of the cycle path so far.

seg.source: Die touristische Vermarktung ist noch ausbaufähig.
seg.translation: It is still possible to develop tourism-related marketing.
Tourist marketing has potential for development.
The tourism marketing is still expandable.

seg.source: Unser Radweg ist im Vergleich zu anderen in Deutschland sehr hochwertig", so die ADFC-Mitglieder.
seg.translation: Our cycle track is of very high quality compared to others in German’, agreed the ADFC members.
Compared to others in Germany, our bike path is really good" according to the ADFC members.
Our bike path is of a very high quality compared to others in Germany, "says the ADFC members.

seg.source: Als äußerst kritische Gefahrenstelle schätzt ADFC-Mitglied Susanne Klippert die Situation in der Ascheröder Straße in Treysa ein.
seg.translation: ADFC member Susanne Klippert considers the situation in the Ascheröder Strasse in Treysa to be critically dangerous.
ADFC Susanne Klippert believes that situation on Ascheröder Straße in Treysa as very dangerous.
ADFC member Susanne Klippert considers the situation in the Ascheröder Strasse in Treysa to be an extremely critical danger point.

seg.source: Es gibt keine Abbiegespur auf den Haaße-Hügel.
seg.translation: There is no turning lane on Haaße Hügel.
There is no turning lane on the Haaße hill.
There is no turning track on the Haaße hill.

seg.source: Bei regem Verkehr kann es passieren, dass Radfahrer mitten auf der Straße zwischen beidseitigem Verkehrsfluss warten müssen", erläutert sie.
seg.translation: In heavy traffic, cyclists may end up waiting in the middle of bidirectional traffic flows", she explains.
When traffic is busy, it can be the case that cyclists have to wait in the middle of the road between two lanes of traffic", she explains.
In heavy traffic it can happen that cyclists have to wait in the middle of the road between traffic on both sides, "she explains.

seg.source: Das sei für sportliche Fahrer kein Problem, wohl aber für Ältere und besonders für Kinder.
seg.translation: That would not be a problem for sporty cyclists, but is for older people and especially for children.
For sporty riders, this is no problem, but it is a different matter altogether for the elderly and particularly for children.
This is not a problem for sporty drivers, but probably for older people and especially for children.
